import React, { useState } from "react"; const Testimonials = () => { return (

Happy Client Testimonials

bedbugzbgone is definitely a company I would recommend to anyone dealing with bed bug issues. We went for heat treatment and were very happy with the easy prep they asked us to do. All other companies were asking for a lot of prep work which wouldâ€™ve have taken weeks to complete. After two weeks, the owner of the company himself came to do an inspection to make sure everything was good. So far so good!"
"After researching options we decided to go with bedbugzbgone. They provided a one day treatment with less prep work and a guarantee. The technicians were professional and spent the day at our home ensuring all areas of our home were treated with the high temperature. When we returned home we were relieved and pleased with the service provided. We knew right away our home was treated with care. After a 2 week inspection we have seen no evidence of any bedbugs. Would recommend bedbugzbgone."
Zafar is great, very experienced and professional to fight bed bugs. I live in a condo and I had a problem with bed bugs, he told me that they are coming from your neighbor unit, and he was correct. he figured out the whole problem from the source, and I am very pressed to deal with pestend . I am highly recommending this company
); }; export default Testimonials;
